cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government)
SECRET
G.T.6123
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 28th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
There is no change on the British Front.
French Front.
On the French First and Tenth Armies front, between the OISE and the SERRE the line is reported to run :- MORTIERS, DEREY (doubtful), PARGNY, MONCEAU-LE-NEUF, FAUCONZY, LE HERIE, GUISE (exclusive).
2. ITALIAN FRONT.
Progress has been made by the 10th Army under the command of General Lord Cavan, and they have reached the line RONCADELLE STABINZZO, south of S. POLO DI PIAVE, BORGO ZANETTI, BORGO MALANOTTE, C. TONON. Prisoners amounting to nearly 6,000 have been captured.
3. BALKAN FRONT.
In ALBANIA the enemy are resisting on the line of the river MATI. Albanian insurgents are harassing the enemy's retreat.
4. PALESTINE FRONT.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
28th October, 1918.
Issued 1230.
